data.title: Finsceal Rose (TB) Irish thoroughbred for racing by • Youridewedrive
data.meta_description: Finscael Rose is born in 2016 and has raced in 2019 with a 2nd in her luggage. Full sister to High Street Lady. Now ready for racing 2020
data.text:
Racehorses for sale

Finsceal Rose (TB)

Finsceal Rose – born and bred to race.

Finsceal Rose is born in 2016 is by the Gallileo (IRE) stallion Finsceal Fior (IRE) out of North Light Rose (USA), a mare by North Light (IRE) out of Damask Rose (IRE) by Dr Devious (IRE).

Finsceal Rose has two older sisters that both have a winning record:

Amazing Grazing (IRE) by Intense Focus trained by Rebecca Bateman 37starts, 3 wins from 5f to 7.1f (£26643).

High Street Lady (IRE) who is a full sister to Finceal Rose (also by Finsceal Fior). This filly has made 11 starts and had 1 win over 10.7F (£11493)

Finsceal Rose is born and bred in Co Galway. She has mainly been living out which has produced a strong and healthy horse. She has been coping well with training.

Own race record

Finsceal Rose herself has raced 8 times in 2019 with a second as the best result at Bellewstown (video showing highlights race number 6), trained by Gavin Patrick Cromwell. She was showing some fabulous spirit in this race having found her way from the outside track. She has due to the COVID 19 lockdown had some time off but is ready to return to training. We believe there is plenty left in the tank and the best is yet to come.

Health and future

Finsceal Rose is in good health without any injuries, she is also open to any vetting. Apart from racing she could well have a future in ROR or eventing as her temperament is fabulous and she is well handled and trained throughout.
